about_the_game:
This demo lets players step into the role of a medieval lord, directing the shape and growth of their township. Players can try the innovative urban planning tool to draw districts, craft over 40 buildings, and experience the game’s companion system. 

Players can also use the Photo Mode to capture their creations and share them with the community on Steam and social media. The demo includes a tutorial to guide players through the creation of vast and organic medieval cities and is available in English, German, French, Russian, Ukrainian, and Simplified Chinese.
